title: 11 perch brand new solid build house for sale in Battaramulla
details:
Dear sir / madam.

The property located at highly residential area at Akuregoda, Pelawatte, Battaramulla.

300 meters to main road. 20 foot road access. , architecture designed 11 perch modern designed.

04 bed rooms. attached bath room available for master bedroom.

large rooms, garden space. solar power. , 3 car parking. pantry. kitchen. , dinning. , servant and driver rooms, A/C units for each rooms, etc...

Fully covered by parapet walls. 3700 sqf. ,

45.8million. Negotiate

Please call for more details

Regards
Dilan
